project.name: antupdate
project.description: Shows how multiple JRXML files can be updated in batch mode using ANT.

target.name: update1
target.description: Updates report designs specified using the "srcdir" in the <jru> tag. Generated .jrxml files keep their relative location and are placed in directory structure similar to the source files structure.

target.name: update2
target.description: Updates report designs specified using a <fileset> in the <src> tag. Generated .jrxml files lose their relative location and are placed in the same output directory.
